label1.question: Which parts of the Earth receive the most heat from the Sun?
Unequal heating to the Earth causes what type of air movement?
Water <u>condenses</u> on ________ to form clouds. Fill in the blank.
label1.filled_question: Water condenses on <u>surface</u> to form clouds.

label2.question: The lungs are the main organs of which system in the body?
While you are breathing, our lungs inflate or puff up. What is this process?
Which type of cells release sticky mucus in your nose and airway?
What tiny, hair-like structures cover the inside of the airway?
The process that occurs when there is less space in the lungs is what?
What are the muscles that do the work of inhaling and exhaling?
Why is it important to have nose hairs?
When a person inhales cigarette smoke, they damage their cilia. Why might this make it harder to breathe?
Polio is a disease that can paralyse, or stop the movement of, the muscles in the chest. If someone has polio why would they not be able to breathe on their own?
Imagine you are in an environment with dust in the air. Describe how your respiratory system would react.
